譡字的基本解释

譡
dǎng
古同“谠”。

譡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàng］
［《廣韻》丁浪切，去宕，端。］
同“讜1”。
(1)说话中理。见《集韵·去宕》。
(2)作人名用字。宋有赵有譡。见《宋史·宗室世系表三》。

譡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　譡； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1182第22
【集韻】同讜。　又人名。【宋史·宗室表】贈朝散郞令譡。　又【集韻】都郞切，音當。忠言也。

譡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
譡字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
dǎng
The ancient same "谠".
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàng］
["Guangyun" Ding Lang cut, go down, end. ]
Same as "谠1".
(1) Speak reasonably. See "Jiyun·Qudang".
(2) Use words for names. Song You Zhao Youzhen. See "Song History · Clan Lineage Table III".
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　譡; Kangxi strokes: 20; page number: page 1182 to 22
[Jiyun] the same as that.　Another name. [Song History · Clan Table] Presented to the dynasty and scattered Yan Ling.　 [Ji Yun] All are cut and sound. Loyalty too.
